name: Fierce Hurl
description: When throwing a polearm, you may use Strength instead of Dexterity for the attack roll, but the range is halved.

improvements.name: Piercing Blow
improvements.description: +1d to the damage roll on a hit.

improvements.name: Knock Flat
improvements.description: On a hit, the foe must roll Dexterity against the attack roll, falling prone on a loss.
